dct_title_s: Plano de la ciudad de Lima metropolitana : población actualizada: 4,850,000
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and form lines. Oriented with north towards top left corner. Accompanied by: attached sheet of "Indice de avenidas y jirones".
